红: 需求驱动物料需求计划

1_Red: Green zone qty option considering desired Order Cycle
红: 考虑下单频率的绿区数量参数

1_Red: If sets date range of same type must not overlap.
红: 相同类型日期范围不可重叠

1_Red: Leave plant empty, will run actions for all plants
红: 工厂字段留空默认针对所有工厂执行操作

1_Red: Length-of-period horizon in days looking future.
Length-of-period horizon in days looking past.
Maximum qty for a single procurement
Minimum qty for a single procurement

Moves created through this buffer will be put in this 
procurement group. If none is given, the moves generated by 
stock rules will be grouped into one big picking.
Number of days to group demand for this product during the MRP run, in order to determine the quantity to order.
红: MRP运算时汇总需求的天数，用于进行集中采购

1_Red: Qualified Demand: past due and due today plus order spike
红: 合格需求：过期未出货(含当天)以及超大订单阀值的当日销售订单

1_Red:
Quantity available in this stock buffer, this is the total 
 quantity on hand minus the outgoing reservations.
红: 缓冲库存可用数量，即实际库存扣除已预留库存
超出总补货交期的待申请数量

1_Red:
Request for Quotation total quantity that is planned outside of "
the DLT horizon.
红: 超出补货周期的待申请数量

1_Red: The procurement quantity will be rounded up to this multiple.
红: 订单以此数量进行圆整

1_Red:
When defined, this lead time will be added to the decoupled lead time.
       This is particularily useful in situations of infrequent but 
        periodic demand. E.g. We receive a large order every 30 days, 
       whereas the supplier takes 10 days to supply. 
        In this case the yellow zone must cover for the 
        entire cycle of 30 days of demand.
        In situations with infrequent demand the ADU tends to be very
         small, and every new order would be treated as a spike, when
        in reality this is not an exceptional situation.
红: 此天数会追加到补货交期中，适用于间歇性需求，如每30天收一个大订单，而补货交期为10天，此时黄区应满足30天的需求，所以此额外交期应维20天。非经常性需求往往导致日均用量较小，每个新销售订单都应被计为大订单

1_Red:
Whenever the buffer is recomputed, if this option is set, it "
will procure automatically if needed.
红: 如果勾选此选项，缓冲库存计算即触发自动订货
采购订单缓冲库存状态
生产工单缓冲库存状态
